meanings.meaning: 1. time; hour; moment 刻 signifies a time of day; 秋 signifies an important time１２才の時彼は声変わりした。His voice broke when he was twelve.
2. occasion; case Only applies to 時車を運転する時はいくら注意してもしすぎることはない。You cannot be too careful when you drive a car.
3. chance; opportunity; season Only applies to 時
4. the times; the age; the day Only applies to 時
5. tense Grammar, Only applies to 時
6. Autumn Autumn or fall is one of the four temperate seasons. Autu... Read more
刻 【とき】、秋 【とき】
1. hour; o'clock 私は１０時ごろ寝ついた。I went to sleep about 10 o'clock.

meanings.meaning: 2. (specified) time; when ...; during ... See also 緊急時
1. time for ...; time to ... See also 食事時, after noun or -masu stem of verb
2. good time to ...; opportunity to ... See also 売り時
3. season See also 花見時

meanings.meaning: 1. time いつだって読書の時間は見つけられる。We can always find time for reading.
2. hour 彼は勤勉な生徒だ。毎日３時間彼は勉強している。He is a diligent student. He studies three hours every day.
3. period; class; lesson

1. always; all the time; at all times Usually written using kana alone彼はいつも学校に遅れる。He is always late for school.
2. never Usually written using kana alone, with neg. verb私は日曜日にはいつも家にいない。I'm never at home on Sundays.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 3. usual; regular; habitual; customary Usually written using kana aloneいつものところでいつもの人達に会った。I met the usual people at the usual place.

sentences.translation: He is always late for school.
I'm never at home on Sundays.
I met the usual people at the usual place.

1. always; all the time; at all times Usually written using kana alone私はいつでも喜んでお手伝いします。I am always ready to help you.
2. (at) any time; whenever (you like) Usually written using kana aloneあなたはいつでも歓迎されています。You will be welcome at any time.
何時でも 【なんどきでも】

sentences.translation: I am always ready to help you.
You will be welcome at any time.

2. days and hours

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 1. temporary; provisional; interim 私はその会社で臨時の仕事を得た。I got a temporary job at the firm.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 2. special; extraordinary; extra 彼等は貿易問題について臨時の会合を開いた。They held a special session on trade problems.

sentences.translation: I got a temporary job at the firm.
They held a special session on trade problems.
